game.name: Clarent Saga: Chronicles
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: A NOVEL with RPG turn-based battles inspired by HD-2D RPG. Graphics and music inspired by 16-bit JRPG classics. The second entry of Clarent Saga.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A NOVEL with RPG turn-based battles inspired by HD-2D RPG. Graphics and music inspired by 16-bit JRPG classics. The second entry of Clarent Saga.
